name: jamstack-web-starter
description: Minimal boilerplate for new projects built with Eleventy, Tailwind, PurgeCSS and PostCSS

scripts.start: gulp build & gulp watch & concurrently "webpack --watch --config webpack.config.js" "eleventy --serve --watch"
scripts.build: del dist && eleventy && NODE_ENV=production  webpack -p --config webpack.config.js && gulp build &&  ELEVENTY_ENV=production eleventy

author: Chris Collins
